FuncDef: The undo rule command deletes an ACL rule in the Layer  ACL view. The undo rule command deletes an ACL rule in the Layer  ACL view. By default, no Layer 2 ACL rule is created and no description is configured for an ACL rule.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of an ACL rule.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 4294967294.

Examples: [*HUAWEI-acl-L2-4999] rule 23 description This rule is used to filter packets according to the MAC address and protocol type.
ExtraInfo: Run the rule description command to configure a description for an ACL in any of the following situations:
